title: Leaves from my autography
snippet: The circumstances  will be detailed subsequently.* In order partially to undo the evil, I communicated with Mr Balgarnie, chartered accountant, Edinburgh, who had acted as trustee on my estate. He replied as follows : " 9 North St David Street, " Edinburgh, Wi Fehmary 1866. " My dear Sir, - I regret to find that after all you have suffered , both in your feelings and pecuniary affairs, any one should feel inclined to throw suspicion upon your doings and motives.
